name: Keep Charlie Alive
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46

Charlie has a deadly virus that is slowly draining his health, collect the gems to restore some HP and find the key and finish the level before Charlie's HP reaches 0, you must Keep Charlie Alive!

Controls are:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move or left joystick on a controller

Space to jump or A on an Xbox Controller.

I made this game in 3 days. It's shorter then i wanted but i had fun doing it! If you like the game, let me know!
